item.title: Children Of Bodom - Complete Discography
item.dc:creator: @Omfgurweird Omfgurweird
item.description:
@Omfgurweird wrote:

xerozcheez:

Thanks for the torrent Pwnd, torrents > http, because although http is usually faster, it’s a bitch cos if your internet crashes you have to restart, and for download films you have to download each part from RS or use rapget on megaupload (which times out a lot lol), so yeah torrents ftw

Well these files are on megaupload, but if you use the linkgrabber, it wont time out, so far everytime i’ve used it, its worked great, its even faster then d/ling directly from the site
